title: Living free
creator_credit: Jack Couffer, Paul Radin, Carl Foreman and Columbia
brief_description: The sequel to “Born free” continues the adventures of Joy and George Adamson. Elsa the lioness brings her three cubs out of the wilderness to the couple who raised her. When Elsa suddenly dies, the cubs who cannot fend for themselves, attack domestic animals to survive before disappearing into the wild. The Adamson’s launch a desperate attempt to find the young lions and bring them to the safety of the game reserve. Starring Susan Hampshire and Nigel Davenport.
